pages.text: $(item)Heat Vents$() are another Reactor Component for manipulating Heat.$(br2)Unlike $(l:ftbic:generators/nuclear/coolant)Coolant Cells$(), Heat Vents will $(major)repair themselves over time$().
The $(item)Advanced Heat Vent$() is simply a superior version of the normal Vent. It cools itself twice as fast.

The $(item)Reactor Heat Vent$() cools both itself and the Reactor at the same time, though at a slower rate.$(br2)These can be placed anywhere, if you only want it to cool the Reactor instead of absorbing Heat itself.
The $(item)Overclocked Heat Vent$() is the upgraded form, working much faster.
The $(item)Component Heat Vent$() cannot absorb Heat, but instead cools all 4 adjacent Components.$(br2)Best used with $(l:ftbic:generators/nuclear/exchangers)Heat Exchangers$().
